description: Organized by cultural and linguistic relationships rather than technical Unicode categories, making it more intuitive for users to find relevant fonts for their language or region.

latin.description: Scripts based on the Latin alphabet, used by most European languages and many others worldwide

cyrillic.description: Scripts based on the Cyrillic alphabet, used by Slavic and other Eastern European languages

greek.description: Scripts based on the Greek alphabet, used by Greek and some other languages

arabic.description: Scripts based on the Arabic alphabet, used by Arabic, Persian, Urdu, and many other languages

hebrew.description: Scripts based on the Hebrew alphabet, used by Hebrew and some other languages

chinese_simplified.description: Writing systems used for Chinese languages in simplified form, primarily used in mainland China and Singapore

chinese_traditional.description: Writing systems used for Chinese languages in traditional form, primarily used in Taiwan and other regions

chinese_hongkong.description: Writing systems used for Chinese languages in Hong Kong variant

japanese.description: Writing systems used for Japanese language

korean.description: Writing systems used for Korean language

indian.description: Writing systems used for major languages spoken in India

sri_lankan.description: Writing systems used in Sri Lanka

thai.description: Writing systems used for Thai language

khmer.description: Writing systems used for Khmer (Cambodian) language

lao.description: Writing systems used for Lao language

myanmar.description: Writing systems used for Myanmar (Burmese) language

vietnamese.description: Writing systems used for Vietnamese language

armenian_georgian.description: Unique writing systems of the Caucasus region

ethiopic.description: Writing systems used in Ethiopia and Eritrea

tibetan_mongolian.description: Writing systems used in Tibet, Mongolia, and surrounding regions

native_american.description: Writing systems created by Native American communities

specialized_symbols.description: Symbols and notation systems for specific purposes
